item.title: CHRISTOPHER MOON President & Founder Haunted times Magazine
item.description: CHRISTOPHER MOON President & Founder Christopher Moon had his first paranormal experience at the age of seven. Daily occurrences from that time on included objects disappearing and reappearing, doors opening and closing on their own fruition, strange shadows and light anomalies, and nightly haunted sonnets on the familyâ€™s one hundred year old grand piano. He also discovered that he had a definite psychic/ medium sense, and began doing remedial paranormal investigations at a mere 12 years of age. After years of paranormal and psychic occurrences, at the age of 16, Christopher decided he could no longer turn his back on what he felt he was truly meant to do. Thus, he officially began his life as a paranormal researcher, and in 2004, published his first issue of his now worldwide distributed Haunted Times Magazine. Christopher is also one of the few people able who can accurately operate Thomas Edisonâ€™s Telephone to the Dead, and uses the device for paranormal research and investigations, during his Ghost Hunter University events, and for individuals wanting private readings. Christopher tours college campuses around the country, lecturing on his ghost hunting techniques and providing positive evidence, as well as interactive investigations using the Telephone to the Dead to many excited students, eager to learn more about the paranormal. His television interviews and appearances include, most notably, truTv Networkâ€™s Door to the Dead, NBCâ€™s Today Show, A & E Networkâ€™s Paranormal State, as well as numerous ABC, CBS, NBC, CW (formally the WB), and FOX affiliate stations around the country. He has appeared on many nationwide radio programs, such as Coast to Coast AM with George Noory, Coast to Coast AM with Ian Punnitt, TAPS Radio Beyond Reality, KHOW Radio with Peter Boyles, Canadaâ€™s Richard Syrett Show, BBS Radio â€“ Beyond Two Worlds Radio Show, Clear Channel Radioâ€™s Real Paranormal Talk,Late Night Live With Dirty D.
item.dc:creator: Dirty D
item.itunes:summary:
CHRISTOPHER MOON President & Founder
Christopher Moon had his first paranormal experience at the age of seven. Daily occurrences from that time on included objects disappearing and reappearing, doors opening and closing on their own fruition, strange shadows and light anomalies, and nightly haunted sonnets on the familyâ€™s one hundred year old grand piano.
He also discovered that he had a definite psychic/ medium sense, and began doing remedial paranormal investigations at a mere 12 years of age. After years of paranormal and psychic occurrences, at the age of 16, Christopher decided he could no longer turn his back on what he felt he was truly meant to do. Thus, he officially began his life as a paranormal researcher, and in 2004, published his first issue of his now worldwide distributed Haunted Times Magazine.
Christopher is also one of the few people able who can accurately operate Thomas Edisonâ€™s Telephone to the Dead, and uses the device for paranormal research and investigations, during his Ghost Hunter University events, and for individuals wanting private readings.
Christopher tours college campuses around the country, lecturing on his ghost hunting techniques and providing positive evidence, as well as interactive investigations using the Telephone to the Dead to many excited students, eager to learn more about the paranormal.
His television interviews and appearances include, most notably, truTv Networkâ€™s Door to the Dead, NBCâ€™s Today Show, A & E Networkâ€™s Paranormal State, as well as numerous ABC, CBS, NBC, CW (formally the WB), and FOX affiliate stations around the country. He has appeared on many nationwide radio programs, such as Coast to Coast AM with George Noory, Coast to Coast AM with Ian Punnitt, TAPS Radio Beyond Reality, KHOW Radio with Peter Boyles, Canadaâ€™s Richard Syrett Show, BBS Radio â€“ Beyond Two Worlds Radio Show, Clear Channel Radioâ€™s Real Paranormal Talk,Late Night Live With Dirty D.

item.title: Steve From SCi Fi Channels Ghost Hunters Checks in with D
item.description: Steve Gonsalves is the technical manager of The Atlantic Paranormal Society (TAPS), based in Warwick, Rhode Island. Gonsalves, a native of New Bedford, Massachusetts of Portuguese ancestry, started investigating the paranormal when he was only 16 and formed New England Paranormal in 2001.[1] Gonsalves occasionally gives lectures on the paranormal, such as one called "Ghostbusters! The Science Behind Paranormal Investigations" which he presented on January 28, 2005 at the Boston Center for Adult Education.[2] In June 2005, Steve co-founded TAPS Paranormal Magazine. Before Ghost Hunters, Gonsalves was a police officer.[1] Cast member on Sci-Fi Channel's Ghost Hunters Technical Manager for TAPS, The Atlantic Paranormal Society Founder of the TAPS Paramagazine www.tapsparamag.com Founder of New England Paranormal www.newenglandparanormal.com www.LateNightLive.net www.myspace.com/dirtyd1978 www.cayaradio.com
item.dc:creator: Dirty D
item.itunes:summary:
Steve Gonsalves is the technical manager of The Atlantic Paranormal Society (TAPS), based in Warwick, Rhode Island.
Gonsalves, a native of New Bedford, Massachusetts of Portuguese ancestry, started investigating the paranormal when he was only 16 and formed New England Paranormal in 2001.[1] Gonsalves occasionally gives lectures on the paranormal, such as one called "Ghostbusters! The Science Behind Paranormal Investigations" which he presented on January 28, 2005 at the Boston Center for Adult Education.[2] In June 2005, Steve co-founded TAPS Paranormal Magazine.
Before Ghost Hunters, Gonsalves was a police officer.[1]

item.title: Christopher Saint Booth Speaks About Children of The Grave on DVD Now Due on SCI FI Channel in March 08
item.description: Philip and Christopher Booth born in Yorkshire, England started their career at an early age. Influenced by The Beatles, the twins were singing and strumming at the age of four. Atlantic crossing brought them to Canada where at the age of thirteen they were writing and performing at the local establishments. In 1978 they were invited to combine forces with, Juno award winner, Sweeney Todd. (LONDON RECORDS) Worldwide touring commenced immediately as their new gold album paved their way to sunny California. Upon arriving in Los Angeles they were greeted with a publishing deal (RCA MUSIC) to begin writing vocalizations and musical scores for film, cable and television. Desires of new creative outlets began development, now reaching out to the visual side of entertainment. Audio with Video studios were soon built to quench this creative thirst. Philip, now an accomplished award winning Director, Digital FX Artist and Editor is the eyes while Christopher, a successful film and music Producer, Production Designer and Composer became the ears of their ventures. Together they have written, edited, animated, directed and scored some of BILLBOARDs TOP TEN releases including, Film Features, Erotic Thrillers, Music Videos and over seas releases. Internationally renown for their provocative style, Independent films soon broadened their horizon. Financing a million-dollar HD digital domain in Los Angeles California, this is where they would design and build their ultimate dreams. As well as endorsed by an array of electronic arts manufacturers, no boundaries would be left untouched. For every new technical toy that their eyes and ears could ever dream of soon became vivid. As Apple licensed developers and 3rd party designers for SoftImage, Apple, AMP, APDA and Microsoft, TWINTALK ENTERTAINMENT GROUP, continue to design the future of entertainment and media for all platforms. New concepts with slick designs go hand in hand with the latest web technology. Philip and Christopher work with the new world of 24P HD media at their fingertips, they mix a wild imagination with the coolest technology. With over 50 HD features behind them, these boys build it all from scratch with the insight of what's happening tomorrow for the people today. A panoramic view of freedom with the fresh scent of change inspires this duo to create a brave new world for your eyes and ears. TWINTALK ENTERTAINMENT GROUP continue to design the future of entertainment and media for all platforms. New concepts with slick designs go hand in hand with the latest Internet movie & music download technology. Philip and Christopher work with the new world of 24P High Definition media at their fingertips, they mix a wild imagination with the coolest technology. With over 50 HD features behind them, these boys build it all from scratch with the insight of what's happening tomorrow for the people today. A panoramic view of freedom with the fresh scent of change inspires this duo to create a brave new world for your eyes and ears. True and innovative, inspiration and production helps paint the big picture, for superstars of the future as well as the past. The Booth Brother's are producing and directing feature films and documentaries for SONY PICTURES, Paramount Pictures, Sci-fi Channel (NBC-Universal) Fremantle Media (American Idol) with direct licensing for the foreign market. Co-production companies include: Tee For Two Music Publishing (BMI) Twintalk Entertainment Group, Spooked Productions and Saint and Sinners Entertainment. Recent Indie films include:DEATH TUNNEL (Sony Pictures, Paramount Pictures-Spain), Gaumont-France, Columbia Tri-Star, and the horror documentary feature, SPOOKED (Sci-fi Channel-NBC-Universal). DarkPlace, Children Of the Grave and Hell's Orphans slotted for 2007 through 2008 and will be available at the 2006 American Film Market check them out on the web www.myspace.com/boothbrothersfilms www.childrenofthegrave.com show Websites www.LateNightLive.org www.myspace.com/dirtyd1978

item.title: ArchBishop James Long .Speaks on evil and the Paranormal
item.description: Bishop James Long was born in Louisville, Kentucky and was raised Roman Catholic. He attended a Roman Catholic grade school and it was during the time while he was attending Kindergarten that he knew that he had a calling to serve as a priest. His mother had asked him what he wanted to be when he grew up and James pointed at the priest and said, "I want to do what he does." From then on, his calling to serve as a priest grew stronger as the years progressed until he decided to join the seminary and began his formation. James graduated from Loyola University in Chicago and continued his priestly studies by enrolling in major seminary (graduate school). It was during this time that James decided that God was calling him to serve in the Old Catholic Church. Throughout his studies in the seminary, James focused primarily on Demonology and Paranormal Studies. check out James's church on the web www.universalcatholic.com show links www.LatenightLive.org www.myspace.com/dirtyd1978

He attended a Roman Catholic grade school and it was during the time while he was attending Kindergarten that he knew that he had a calling to serve as a priest. item.title: Father Andrew Calder Speaks On the Demonic And spiritual warfare
item.description: a somewhat normal 42 year old who is involved in the paranormal research and is a ordained Episcopal priest who performs exorcisms. My main goal has been for years is to try and help those people and families that are suffering from demonic/malevolent forces, to try and help them to the best of my ability to free them and their families from the oppressive forces that affect them. To find out more about my work, go to my website: WWW.GEORGIAPARANORMAL.COM Check andrew out on the web WWW.GEORGIAPARANORMAL.COM www.myspace.com/andrewcalder check me out on the web www.myspace.com/dirtyd1978 www.LatenightLive.org www.wirnonline.com www.cayaent.com
